verses.verse: Doesn't<WH2451> wisdom cry<WH7121> out?<WH5414> Doesn't<WH2451> understanding raise her voice?<WH6963>
On the top<WH7218> of high places<WH4791> by the way,<WH1870> where the paths<WH5410> meet,<WH1004> she stands.<WH5324>
Beside the gates,<WH8179> at<WH3027> the entry<WH6310> of the city,<WH7176> at the entry<WH6310> doors,<WH6607> she cries aloud:<WH7442>
"To you men,<WH376> I call!<WH7121> I send my voice<WH6963> to the sons<WH1121> of mankind.<WH120>
You simple,<WH6612> understand<WH995> prudence.<WH6195> You fools,<WH3684> be of an understanding<WH6195> heart.<WH3820>
Hear,<WH8085> for I will speak<WH1696> excellent things.<WH5057> The opening<WH4669> of my lips<WH8193> is for right things.<WH4339>
For my mouth<WH2441> speaks<WH1897> truth.<WH571> Wickedness<WH7562> is an abomination<WH8441> to my lips.<WH8193>
All the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> are in righteousness.<WH6664> There is nothing crooked<WH6617> or perverse in them.<WH6617>
They are all plain<WH5228> to him who understands,<WH995> right<WH3477> to those who find<WH4672> knowledge.<WH1847>
Receive<WH3947> my instruction<WH4148> rather than silver;<WH3701> knowledge<WH1847> rather than choice<WH977> gold.<WH2742>
For wisdom<WH2451> is better<WH2896> than rubies.<WH6443> All the things that may be desired<WH2656> can't<WH7737> be compared to it.
"I,<WH2451> wisdom, have made prudence<WH6195> my dwelling.<WH7931> Find out<WH4672> knowledge and discretion.<WH1847>
The fear<WH3374> of Yahweh<WH3068> is to hate<WH8130> evil.<WH7451> I hate<WH8130> pride,<WH1344> arrogance,<WH1344> the evil<WH7451> way,<WH1870> and the perverse<WH8419> mouth.<WH6310>
Counsel<WH6098> and sound knowledge<WH8454> are mine.<WH8454> I have understanding and power.<WH1369>
By me kings<WH4428> reign,<WH4427> and princes<WH7336> decree<WH2710> justice.<WH6664>
By me princes<WH8269> rule;<WH8323> nobles,<WH5081> and all the righteous rulers<WH8199> of the earth.<WH776>
I love<WH157> those who love<WH157> me.<WH7836> Those who seek me diligently will find me.<WH4672>
With me are riches,<WH6239> honor,<WH3519> enduring<WH6276> wealth,<WH1952> and prosperity.<WH6666>
My fruit<WH6529> is better<WH2896> than gold,<WH2742> yes,<WH6337> than fine gold; my yield<WH8393> than choice<WH977> silver.<WH3701>
I walk<WH1980> in the way<WH734> of righteousness,<WH6666> in the midst<WH8432> of the paths<WH5410> of justice;<WH4941>
That I may give<WH5157> wealth<WH3426> to those who love<WH157> me.<WH4390> I fill their treasuries.<WH214>
"Yahweh<WH3068> possessed<WH7069> me in the beginning<WH7225> of his work,<WH4659> before<WH6924> his deeds of old.<WH4659>
I was set up<WH5258> from everlasting,<WH5769> from the beginning,<WH7218> before<WH6924> the earth existed.<WH776>
When there were no depths,<WH8415> I was brought forth,<WH2342> when there were no springs<WH4599> abounding<WH3513> with water.<WH4325>
Before the mountains<WH2022> were settled<WH2883> in place,<WH6440> before the hills,<WH1389> I was brought forth;<WH2342>
while as yet he had not made<WH6213> the earth,<WH776> nor the fields,<WH2351> nor the beginning<WH7218> of the dust<WH6083> of the world.<WH8398>
When he established<WH3559> the heavens,<WH8064> I was there;<WH2710> when he set a circle<WH2329> on the surface<WH6440> of the deep,<WH8415>
when he established<WH553> the clouds<WH7834> above,<WH4605> when the springs<WH5869> of the deep<WH8415> became strong,<WH5810>

when he gave<WH7760> to the sea<WH3220> its boundary,<WH2706> that the waters<WH4325> should not violate<WH5674> his commandment,<WH6310> when he marked<WH2710> out the foundations<WH4144> of the earth;<WH776>
then I was the craftsman<WH525> by his<WH681> side.<WH8191> I was a delight day<WH3117> by day,<WH6256> always rejoicing<WH7832> before him,<WH6440>
Rejoicing<WH7832> in his whole<WH8398> world.<WH776> My delight<WH8191> was with the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>
"Now therefore,<WH1121> my sons, listen<WH8085> to me,<WH835> for blessed are those who keep<WH8104> my ways.<WH1870>
Hear<WH8085> instruction,<WH4148> and be wise.<WH2449> Don't<WH6544> refuse it.
Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> who hears<WH8085> me,<WH8245> watching daily<WH3117> at my gates,<WH1817> waiting<WH8104> at my door<WH6607> posts.<WH4201>
For whoever finds<WH4672> me,<WH4672> finds life,<WH2416> and will obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> from Yahweh.<WH3068>
But he who sins<WH2398> against me wrongs<WH2554> his own soul.<WH5315> All those who hate<WH8130> me love<WH157> death.<WH4194>"
